name: Big Band
description: Big Band was created to stabilize the delicious flavor of Bubble Gum with a strong, heavy yielding plant. Chronic, this strain’s second parent, grows massive colas with generous resin production and hybridized sativa effects, making it a natural compliment to Bubble Gum’s indica-dominant qualities. Big Band’s effects are joyful and loud, exhibiting deeply relaxing effects  with an assortment of juicy berries of the palate.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Giggly, Hungry, Stress, Muscle Spasms, Fatigue, Insomnia, Inflammation, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
